title: What is the best way to cook canned food? - Quora

response.answer_text: In a pot or pan. Seriously the best thing to do is freshen it up with some fresh ingredients. For example….a simple can of beans can be bedazzled by adding some fresh chopped cilantro, diced tomatoes and shallots after heating. Add some pizazz ! of course if you are lazy…you can just eat it cold right out of the can…why dirty a pot ?
